name: Tainted Memories
description:
Tainted Memories is an artsy/story based game made in 48 hours for Drug Jam. This games examines memories, love, and loss.

You awake from an accident to find yourself in a mysterious place. You must confront your old memories and piece back together what remains of your life while a spirit taunts you along the way.

WASD - Movement

Space - Interact

The game is fairly basic in it's current state, but I'm seriously considering expanding on the idea and making it into a full scale game. I'd appreciate all feedback and suggestions.

Created By Divitos
